['With the current burgeoning of interest in expanding consciousness and in mental science in general , it is natural that we turn to the ancient science of Raja Yoga .', 'The Yoga Sutras comprise the first and foremost scripture of Yoga and within these 200 short sutras , the entire science of Yoga is delineated .', 'If the restraint of the mental modifications is achieved one has reached the goal of Yoga .', 'All the differences in the outside world are the outcome of your mental modifications .', 'There is a Sanskrit saying , **CODEC_ERROR** eva manushyanam karanam bandha **CODEC_ERROR** **CODEC_ERROR** the mind , so the man ; bondage or liberation are in your own **CODEC_ERROR** If you feel bound , you are bound .', '**CODEC_ERROR** the Seer [ Self ] abides in His own **CODEC_ERROR** You are that true Seer .', 'When the mind ceases to create thought forms or when the chittam is completely free from vrittis , it becomes as clear as a still lake and you see your true Self .', 'And , according to the Yogic scientists like **CODEC_ERROR** even many modern **CODEC_ERROR** the different forms of energy is one unchanging consciousness or spirit or Self .', 'By resting , Patanjali means that the true you is resting while your body and mind function .', 'When you are the witness you are not responsible for your actions because you are not acting .', 'So , either act and be responsible , or allow the mind and body to act and be a witness , totally free .']
